concepts.BODY_POSITION_27_DESC: Body position for procedure or blood pressure measurement
concepts.BODY_MASS_INDEX_21_DESC:
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a relationship between weight and height that is associated with body fat and health risk.

The equation is BMI = body weight in kilograms/height in meters squared.
concepts.MALNUTRITION_OF_MODERATE_DEGREE_(GOMEZ:_: Malnutrition of moderate degree (Gomez: 60% to Less than 75% of Standard Weight)
concepts.DIASTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_26_DESC: A patient's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.MALNUTRITION_OF_MILD_DEGREE_(GOMEZ:_75%_: Malnutrition of mild degree (Gomez: 75% to Less than 90% of Standard Weight)
concepts.PULSE_28_DESC: Patient pulse rate, as measured with a peripheral oximeter.
concepts.ARTERIAL_BLOOD_OXYGEN_SATURATION_(PULSE_: Oxygen saturation, as measured from a peripheral oximeter.
concepts.SYSTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_25_DESC: A patient's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
